versos: (observed) Exodus 12:24 - "You are to observe this as a lasting ordinance for you and your descendants.";;;

(peculiar) 1 Peter 2:9 - "But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.";;;

(heal) James 5:16 - Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous person is powerful and effective.;;;
(daughter) "Daughters of Jerusalem, I charge you by the gazelles and by the does of the field: Do not arouse or awaken love until it so desires." - Song of Solomon 2:7 NIV;;;
(softly) Isaiah 40:11 - He tends his flock like a shepherd: He gathers the lambs in his arms and carries them close to his heart; he gently leads those that have young.;;

(joktan) Genesis 10:25 - To Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg
(male) Genesis 1:27 - So God created mankind in his own image, in the image of God He created them; male and female He created them.;;;
(throw) "throw all your anxiety onto him, because he cares about you." - 1 Peter 5:7 CEB;;;
(tell) "He said, 'Go and tell this people: Be ever hearing, but never understanding; be ever seeing, but never perceiving.'" - Isaiah 6:9 NIV;;;
